                                                                 HGX-Our,lp Conv"ision

Elena: Here is my best guess as to the meeting Bruce mentioned to you, but I could be wrong.
Wofford's office said there was an agreement with Bruce to do such a meeting, but they haven't
heard back from Bruce about when it will be, etc. Bruce mentioned to me that he was going to
try to pull a meeting together next week, but didn't give me any instructions, and Cathy doesn't
know anything about it.

It doesn't match your bipartisan description.


Presidents' Summit for America's Future -- We are working with the Corporation for National
Service on planning the April summit. We plan to convene a meeting in the next week or so
with representatives from all Federal agencies to discuss their participation in the summit.
